wikipedia_page.main: Robert John C. Robinson (9 November 1906 – 1990) was an English professional footballer. He played for Gillingham in the 1929–30 season.

response: *Robert Robinson (Canadian politician) (1826–1885), Canadian merchant and politician in New Brunswick
*Robert Robinson (painter) (1651–1706), English mezzotint engraver, painter, and stage designer, see Johann Jacob Haid
*Robert Robinson (Baptist) (1735–1790), Baptist Minister and scholar of Cambridge
*Robert Robinson (engineer) (1907–1994), lived in the Soviet Union
